unnormalised: ## Aiyyo! Why You Leaving Your Shopping Cart High and Dry, Yaar?
normalised: ## Aiyyo! Why You Leaving Your Shopping Cart High and Dry, Yaar?

unnormalised: We've all been there, haven't we? Sifting through endless pages of kurtis on Myntra, adding that perfect Diwali gift set for Auntie Kamala, maybe even a swanky new pressure cooker that makes *whistle sounds* like the Sholay train. You're practically *living* in your online shopping cart. Then… poof! You vanish. Gone like Gabbar Singh into the hills.

unnormalised: Left behind is a forlorn shopping cart, gathering digital dust, wondering what it did wrong. We call this, my friends, the dreaded "cart abandonment." And honestly, it's giving us major anxiety.
normalised: Left behind is a forlorn shopping cart, gathering digital dust, wondering what it did wrong. We call this, my friends, the dreaded "cart abandonment." And honestly, it's giving us major anxiety.

unnormalised: But why, oh why, does this happen? Is it the fear of your bank account looking sadder than a Shah Rukh Khan character after losing the love of his life? Perhaps the wifi decided to play hide-and-seek right when you hit the "Pay Now" button? Or maybe, just maybe, your brother Ramesh decided to prank call you pretending to be your boss giving you a serious dressing down, right at the most crucial moment?

unnormalised: So, next time you find yourself abandoning a cart, take a deep breath, channel your inner Rajinikanth, and ask yourself: "Am I really going to let this awesome deal slip away?" The answer, we hope, is a resounding, "NO!" And if you still need some convincing, well, we're just a click away with helpful advice, friendly support, and maybe even a virtual cup of chai. After all, at the end of the day, we're all just trying to make your online shopping experience as *mast* as a Bollywood dance number.
